document_data.name: Devout Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Devout Mamluk Society''', also known as the '''Devout''', was a military organization in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|21}}
document_data.Activities: This [[mamluk]] organization was tasked with protecting the prince of [[Kadarasto]], [[Nari ibn Aman]].
document_data.History: This group was initially part of the [[Devoted Mamluk Society|Devoted]]. They were originally sent with the goal of expanding religious activity in the region, but most of their time and concern was spent protecting the young prince, so the [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir|Grand Caliph]] recognized them as a separate mamluk organization.
document_data.Organization: The Devout were led by [[Mustah Abd al-Nasik]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Devout were based within the [[Cities of the Ancients]] in Kadarasto.
